>
[Ichthyosis Mutagen](/Equipment.aspx?ID=928)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Abomination Vaults</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=59" />
<trait label="Mutagen" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=116" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=127" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #164: Hands of the Devil](/Sources.aspx?ID=75) pg. 72</row>

**Price** 24 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

After you drink this mutagen, your skin continually renews itself, thickening into large, scaly patches.

**Benefit** For 1 minute, you gain fast healing 2 and automatically succeed at flat checks to recover from [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).

**Drawback** Your thickened skin makes quick movement difficult, and your excess skin flakes off with the slightest movement. You take a –2 penalty to Reflex saves for 1 minute. Any creature attempting to [Track](/Actions.aspx?ID=66) you in the next 24 hours gains a +4 circumstance bonus to their check.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
